definition: remarkable ability/magical power
God/abbr. for 神舟[Shen2 zhou1]
deity/soul/spirit/unusual/mysterious/lively/expressive/expression/look/CL:個|个[ge4]/(slang) awesome/amazing
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
to possess great magical power/to possess remarkable abilities
to display one's remarkable skill or prowess/to give full play to one's brilliant abilities
lit. the Eight Immortals cross the sea, each showing his own special talent (idiom)/fig. (of each individual in a group) to give full play to one's unique capabilities
pinyin: Ba1 xian1 guo4 hai3 , ge4 xian3 shen2 tong1

sentences.english: Large market with small commodity is the blue-chip feature of its regional economy.
sentences.chinese: 小商品，大市場，區域經濟各顯神通。

sentences.english: By the evening of the 16th the subtle hand of Hurstwood had made itself apparent.
sentences.chinese: 到了16日晚上，赫斯渥已經巧妙地大顯神通。

sentences.english: Nuwa not only to the day of salvation, but also in creation, work miracles.
sentences.chinese: 女媧不但補天救世，還創造萬物，神通廣大。

sentences.english: I was no longer Lucy who knew what was best for everyone else.
sentences.chinese: 我不再是知道那個神通廣大的露西了。

sentences.english: Lee is a person who would spend money secretly to make people believe he was infinitely capable and influential.
sentences.chinese: 他背地裏花錢，爲要人們相信他神通廣大，有權有勢。

sentences.english: Dipa Ma's abbilities in this regard were once tested by a third party.
sentences.chinese: 蒂帕嬤的這方面的神通曾由第三方測試過。

sentences.english: To shake off the crisis, literary journals find their different ways.
sentences.chinese: 爲擺脫生存危機，文學期刊各顯神通。

sentences.english: If there’s a new Avatar, that means Aang has passed on.
sentences.chinese: 既然新神通登場，那就意味着安昂已經過世。

sentences.english: This engineer showed his magic power in his work.
sentences.chinese: 在工作中，這位工程師大顯神通。

sentences.english: Developing the base of power endowed with concentration founded on intent &the fabrications of exertion.
sentences.chinese: 基於意志和勤行而開發具有定之神通基礎。

sentences.english: Unless destroy a magical power rank, Grey UGG Boots, probably just can thoroughly put on Yin spirit.
sentences.chinese: 除非突破神通階，或許才能徹底抹去陰氣吧。

sentences.english: Living quite minute to finish the magical power now to make the farmland large to too feel unimaginable.
sentences.chinese: 生秋毫畢現的神通讓田宏也感覺到不可思議。

sentences.english: It's the kind of dream you'd expect from a Web wunderkind .
sentences.chinese: 賺大錢的夢想，只能指望網絡神通了。

sentences.english: A person whose true spirit is awakened is a being of wisdom, even though he may not have theurgies .
sentences.chinese: 沒有神通的人只要元神覺醒，他的生命就是智慧生命。

sentences.english: Aryan gods were not expected to work miracles or control men's lives.
sentences.chinese: 指望雅利神什神通奇蹟，者配活。

sentences.english: You're big in Naas. You haven't bought off any judges, have you?
sentences.chinese: 你在納斯神通廣大。你沒有買通過什麼法官吧，是嗎？

definition: gate to enlightment (Buddhism)/Buddhism/way/method/(old) south gate of a palace
magic power
primordial spirit/fundamental essence of life
marvelous/wondrous
time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
to bid farewell/tricks of the trade/pithy mnemonic formula (e.g. Mao Zedong's 16-character mantra 十六字訣|十六字诀 on guerrilla warfare)
(honorific appellation of a deity)
demonic/devil
Mahayana, the Great Vehicle/Buddhism based on the Mayahana sutras, as spread to Central Asia, China and beyond/also pr. [Da4 cheng2]
amazing powers/miraculous skill
skills acquired through religious practice/(fig.) ability/skill/Taiwan pr. [dao4 hang5]
soul
occult force/the power of a God or spirit
good luck/Nature (as the mother of all things)
supreme
magic
